InventoryItems.Name: Coffee
InventoryItems.Description: 1 cup coffee 8oz or 10oz.

InventoryItems.Name: Voice Transformer
InventoryItems.Description: Alter your voice with this 4 x 2.5 inch transformer. It has settings to create 9 different voice effects and features a corded external microphone. Requires one 9V battery, not included. Assorted colors.

InventoryItems.Name: Harmonica
InventoryItems.Description: Key of C, 10 hole metal harmonica. Classic instrument still loads of fun for kids of all ages!

InventoryItems.Name: Cyclops Ball
InventoryItems.Description: Squeeze these creepy Cyclops balls and watch their eyes pop out! They measure about 2 inches in diameter. Assorted styles and colors. Made by Toysmith. Pack of 24 each.

InventoryItems.Name: Rainbow clay
InventoryItems.Description: High quality modeling clay in a set of 24 colors. 18 oz of clay in each set. Make lots of fun figures and designs.

InventoryItems.Name: Elemenosqueeze soft architectural Blocks
InventoryItems.Description: A different animal hand-sculpted for every letter. (Who says there's no such thing as a unicorn?) A Tower of A to Z relief art awaits. Chew on them, -toss them in the tub. Learn the alphabet, build your masterpiece. Pretty, reusable 100% recycled Polypropylene (PP) plastic bag feels remarkably -like fabric.

InventoryItems.Name: Window Mosaic Safari
InventoryItems.Description: Design and create your very own window mosaic art; You can remove the pieces and put them down again; Simply follow the design template provided to make mosaic pictures to hang on your window. ; A perfect gift idea for any child who loves to create; Recommended for ages 7 and up .

InventoryItems.Name: Lazer fingers
InventoryItems.Description: Create your own amazing light show with these sets of mini finger lights. Each set includes four .75 x .5 inch lights with elastic bands. Each light projects a different color.

InventoryItems.Name: Eyelights flashlight
InventoryItems.Description: Kitty, kitty burning bright, please stay by my bed tonight! This whimsical toy cat makes a friendly, reassuring kids' flashlight, thanks to its multicolored LED eyes. Our kid testers loved changing them from color to color (white...blue...green...magenta) with a simple flip of a switch. Going to bed is easier with a cat like this by your side! Fun for daytime, too: it's a rolling toy (there's a caster underneath), and as the cat rolls along, the eye colors flash. Battery included. For ages 2 and up.

InventoryItems.Name: Scouic pull toy
InventoryItems.Description: Squirrel character pull toy. Wheels are slightly off center so the toy moves up and down, side to side. Tail is on a spring so that wiggles when the toy is pulled. Packed in clear plastic box on cardboard base.

InventoryItems.Name: Topanimo Stacking game
InventoryItems.Description: Stack, nest and play with this adorable block set! This set of 6 blocks are brightly colored, numbered, and house a farm animal in each! Stack them in a tower or lay them out to play. Blocks feature fun patterns, flowers and numbers. Ages: 18 months and Up

InventoryItems.Name: Forest animals blocks
InventoryItems.Description: Whimsical 10 nesting cubes with 5 illustrated sides of animals perched in the tree, forest animals, mom and baby, numbers and patterns.

InventoryItems.Name: Nite Hiker Head lamp
InventoryItems.Description: Great for indoors or out, this headlamp has an adjustable elastic strap to fit most children. It has red and white LED lights, and the lamp tilts up and down.

InventoryItems.Name: Chabada Pull toy
InventoryItems.Description:
Cat Pull Along Toy for little toddlers. Cute and funky wooden pull along cat for little ones starting to explore on two feet! We love the little wooden mouse bouncing along on the front of the bike!
As children start to walk they love to pull and push toys and Chabada cat with his little sprung mouse companion is sure to make walking more fun!
Includes pulling string, Suitable from 18 months

InventoryItems.Name: Roulapic pull toy
InventoryItems.Description:
A colourful wooden pull along toy, beautifully designed for pre-school children.
Play is essential to a child’s development and Djeco’s collection is ever more entertaining, educational and imaginative. Faithfull to their artistic approach, the passionate and inventive Djeco creative team calls on talented illustrators to enhance their collection of games and toys.
This is part of their collection of Pre-School Toys. Fun, timeless and gentle in wood… To set out and conquer the world in complete safety.
For Children aged 18+ Months
Measures: 14.5 x 15.5 x 7.8cm

InventoryItems.Name: Scouic pull toy
InventoryItems.Description:
A colourful wooden pull along toy, beautifully designed for pre-school children.
Play is essential to a child’s development and Djeco’s collection is ever more entertaining, educational and imaginative. Faithfull to their artistic approach, the passionate and inventive Djeco creative team calls on talented illustrators to enhance their collection of games and toys.
This is part of their collection of Pre-School Toys. Fun, timeless and gentle in wood… To set out and conquer the world in complete safety.
For Children aged 18+ Months
Measures: 14.5 x 15.5 x 7.8cm

InventoryItems.Name: Whacky Ball
InventoryItems.Description:
Hammer in the morning. Hammer in the evening. Hammer at nap time. And snack time. Whenever. Four beautiful balls-whack them-watch them go! Mirrored background makes it twice as wacky. Hammer squeaks, wheels spin, balls bang. Tray catches balls and they're ready to roll again. Shipped in assorted colors. Clear recyclable packaging with gift tag.
For ages 1 - 3 years old.

InventoryItems.Name: rockin picture projector
InventoryItems.Description: Flashlight comes with assorted clear disks with images of your favorite theme. Place a disk on the end of te flashlight and an image is projected onto the wall, ceiling or other flat surface. Requires two "AA" batteries. (not included) Ages 5 & up 6"

InventoryItems.Name: Voodoo T- Shirt
InventoryItems.Description: S, M, L, XL

InventoryItems.Name: Voodoo Toy Shop Souvenier Shirt
InventoryItems.Description: S, M, L, XL White T-shirt with store logo and voodoo doll

InventoryItems.Name: Walking Stick
InventoryItems.Description: Solid wood, hand crafted walking stick.
